extendedInfo.description: Carbon experience for Android Smartphones. No Tablet support yet.Simple, Dark, and a dash of elegance for your Twitter day-to-day pleasure.Carbon is a Twitter client, but unlike other Twitter clients. All of your Twitter content on one screen. A screen that doesn't get you drilling down to many other screens to reach to what you want. Timelines, Lists, Favourites, Searches, Trends, Profiles, all there.- Tilt Timeline to Refresh- Power Scroll: Scroll/Swipe up or down using Two fingers to jump to top or bottom of Timelines- Tap+Hold on Tweets to make everything clickable right on the Timeline- In-App Browser- In-App YouTube Player- Vine Previews & Playback- QuickTimeline, home screen quick Timeline for Lists, Searches, Trends, etc...- Rich Timelines with full inline images and videos- Rich and HD style for User Profiles- Rich and fun Conversation View- Threaded Direct Messages- Background updates with quick actions for Jelly Bean, per account- Username Autocomplete- Filters for Hashtags, Users, and Keywords- People Search

reviews.title: Best twitter app out there
reviews.comment: This is easily my favourite app for twitter uninstalled the official one for this, looks good and works well with easy controls, 5 stars
reviews.author: Olly Pittabread

reviews.title: Great look and feel.
reviews.comment: Does everything I want and looks cool. How oh how do you compose a direct message?? 5 stars if u can advise.
reviews.author: Julian Taylor

reviews.title: Great.
reviews.comment: thank you for reply. now i understand. the latest update was great. love the widget. thank you very much dev.
reviews.author: MrAizam Ev

reviews.title: Very good
reviews.comment: Wow, smooth, awesome simple UI... Better than any of the paid ones.
reviews.author: Don Wong

reviews.title: Beautiful
reviews.comment: This is the most beautiful twitter app out there. Good functions and features and still easy to use and navigate. Very complete.
reviews.author: Thomas Martin

reviews.title: Slick
reviews.comment: Slick intuitive twitter app, looks great and works great
reviews.author: Paul Morgalla

reviews.title: Awesome but need more.
reviews.comment: This app is totally AWESOME but need more options : 1- I cant change the dark theme, I prefere the light. 2- I want to see the name of the tweep not only the username. 3- I cant reach my drafted tweets!. 4- I want to see my interactions : RTs & favs ...etc. 5- The details of tweets must include the # of RTs and favs.  I really like this app .. nice work (Y)
reviews.author: Ahmed Shata

reviews.title: Great Twitter App
reviews.comment: Loved this app since day 1.  Slick, Simple and Beautiful UI.  Of course, there is always room for improvement and further features but I am sure that will come in time.  Highly Recommended.  What are you waiting for?  Try it.
reviews.author: Rainier Zurbito

reviews.title: My default twitter client
reviews.comment: In app video and page viewing is great. The manual refresh of the timeline allows me to read tweets at my own pace.
reviews.author: Mohit Kalra

reviews.title: Slick, Sexy and Functional!
reviews.comment: This is easily one of the best functioning and looking apps in the market. Cheers to the developer!
reviews.author: Kevin Cowan

reviews.title: Amazing UI
reviews.comment: Really slick and sexy ui for twitter.  Fast and intuitive.
reviews.author: Rick Diaz

reviews.title: Simply awesome
reviews.comment: Seriously, this Twitter app is something that is worth the download. Love the simple dark theme. Hope the next update have the who retweet/favorite/follow on the Mention tab.
reviews.author: Haszariah Suaili

reviews.title: The best twitter app I have ever used.
reviews.comment: This app is outstanding. It has a gorgeous interface and UI.  It\'s an all around great app and it would highly recommend it. :D
reviews.author: Collin Nigro

reviews.title: Great twitter app
reviews.comment: This is an amazing twitter app. It works well and smooth without any problems. Keep up the good work guys.
reviews.author: Sacha Obado

reviews.title: Ommggg im gassed
reviews.comment: This is sick. Wicked UI and the way thing happen like refresh is wickedd
reviews.author: Harpal Saund

reviews.title: Jump to top button
reviews.comment: Awesome app, I would\'ve done 5 star if it had a jump to top button and an option to tweet longer
reviews.author: Roddy Adjei

reviews.title: Brought back photo previews
reviews.comment: Love that they brought photo previews back for any picture. Also love that it shows conversations when you click on tweets in the stream. Now, they just need to add search columns in the main UI.
reviews.author: Brian Bennett

reviews.title: Eh
reviews.comment: It\'s good but the fact that I can\'t see the number of retweets/favorites for each tweet and the people who retweeted/favorited is a major deal breaker.
reviews.author: Ahmed Yasser

reviews.title: Super!
reviews.comment: king off twitter app. but, it should allow one to open external links  with default app, if you have them installed, i.e: instagram, google+, etc. other than that, top notch.
reviews.author: Pedro Manuel de Andrade

reviews.title: I\'m in love
reviews.comment: More ppl need to know abt this  amazing app. Its simple and gorgeous.
reviews.author: justkeyta
